title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 406.6 - Evaluation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 406.6 - Evaluation

State Regulations

The hospital administration shall develop and implement
procedures which provide for at least an annual written evaluation of the swing
bed program to include, as a minimum, a profile of the characteristics of the
patients admitted to the program, the services and degree of services drawn
upon most, occupancy, length of stay and use rate, patient need and disposition
upon discharge. The evaluation shall also include such items as may be
identified and set forth on forms provided by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
406.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
